author: ghellwig
body:
backport of  #15802

Summary of updates:
- tool to determine optimal parameters for the Z->mu mu mass constraint in MillePede for a given track selection (see slide 10 of [presentation at TkAl meeting 24-08-2016](https://indico.cern.ch/event/536885/contributions/2272807/attachments/1326335/1991545/SummaryPresentation_24_08_2016_.pdf))
  - updated default values in MPS
- update of the documentation in the template files
- moved MPS templates to a dedicated directory
- added script to create file lists for alignment and validation
  - ensures that all IOVs are well represented
  - allows random order of input files
  - used in September2016 alignment campaign
- fixed monitoring of used tracks in case of TwoBodyDecayTrajectories
- write out alignments, APEs, and surface deformations by default in MPS
- enable cosmics during collisions in MillePede workflow
- minor cosmetic changes
title: 80X Update of MillePede production system (MPS)
